notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.C. researched literature and conceived the study. A.C., J.C.S., O.O., P.L.R., C.P.-M., T.R., W.L.L. were involved in protocol development, gaining ethical approval, patient recruitment, and data analysis. A.C. wrote the first draft of the manuscript. All authors reviewed and edited the manuscript and approved the final version of the manuscript.
